metadata.title: CVE-2021-23180 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12 and before. Null pointer dereferencein file_extension(),in file.c may lead to execute arbitrary code and denialof service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-23180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.2
htmldoc-common - 1.9.7-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.7-1ubuntu0.2').
